mapper.select: SELECT ID, PW, NAME, ADDRESS, TEL, BIRTH, STORENAME, POINT FROM MASTER
SELECT ID, PW, NAME, ADDRESS, TEL, BIRTH, NVL(STORENAME,'-') STORENAME FROM REQUESTSIGNUP

SELECT RM, ID, PW, NAME, ADDRESS, TEL, BIRTH, STORENAME, POINT FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY ID DESC) RM, ID, PW, NAME, ADDRESS, TEL, BIRTH, STORENAME, POINT FROM MASTER) WHERE RM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} ORDER BY ID

SELECT RM, ID, PW, NAME, ADDRESS, TEL, TO_CHAR(BIRTH,'YY/MM/DD')BIRTH, NVL(STORENAME,'-') STORENAME FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY ID DESC) RM, ID, PW, NAME, ADDRESS, TEL, BIRTH, STORENAME FROM REQUESTSIGNUP) WHERE RM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} ORDER BY ID
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MASTER(ID, PW, NAME, ADDRESS, TEL, BIRTH, STORENAME, POINT) VALUES(#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{address}, #{tel}, TO_DATE(#{birth},'YY-MM-DD'), #{storename}, 0)
